alert.note: Alert for Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 2:13PM CDT until May 15 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wilson County in southeastern Kansas... Southern Woodson County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 212 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Toronto, or 11 miles southwest of Yates Center, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters have reported one inch hail in Hamilton. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Yates Center, Altoona, Toronto, Buffalo, Benedict, Coyville, Cross Timbers State Park, Toronto Lake, Batesville and Rose. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
